item.title: installing metasploit framework on os x el capitan
item.description: This Guide is adapted from Carlos Perez’s Blog (http://www.darkoperator.com/installing-metasploit-framewor/) (which is a must read) with some additions and fixes to make the setup work on OS X El Capitan. This post should help to alleviate some common issues with installing ruby and the Metasploit Framework on OS X. The main issues being that OS X ships with it’s own versions of Ruby that is not compatible with Metasploit and the version of libiconv installed with OS X causes issues installing the Nokogiri gem.
